verses.verse: I was glad, when they sayde vnto me: we wil go in to the house of the LORDE.
Oure fete shal stonde in thy gates, O Ierusalem.
Ierusale is buylded as a cite, that is at vnite in it self.
For there ye trybes go vp, euen the trybes of the LORDE: to testifie vnto Israel, to geue thanckes vnto the name of the LORDE.
For there is the seate of iudgement, eue the seate of the house of Dauid.
O praye for the peace of Ierusale, they shal prospere that loue the.
Peace be within yi walles, and plenteousnes within thy palaces,
For my brethren and companyons sakes, I wil wish the prosperite.
Yee because of ye house of the LORDE oure God, I wil seke to do the good.
